page.title: 05Games Children Play
page.content:
Up to the age of about 10: Plasticine, ring-a-ring o'rosies, marbles, mummies and daddies, various ball games/toys, fruit machines, tag, hide-and-seek, rounders, football, rugby, cricket, running, swimming, card and board games, piggy-back, conkers, kiss-chase piggy-in-the-middle, doctors and nurses, hop-scotch, stuck-in-the-mud, skipping, famous five, cowboys and indians, bicycle-riding, netball, dressing-up, soldiers, leap-frog, fighting, and cops and robbers.
Aged 11-16: Golf, computer games, shooting, Monopoly, card games, hockey, pool,football, tennis, swimming, judo, athletics, sailing, horse-riding, snooker, billiards, rounders, water-polo, video-games, volley-ball, cricket, rugby, British Bull-dogs, Cluedo, darts.
